content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
I'm sorry, but I don't have that information. How can I assist you otherwise?
Nice to meet you, Arun! How can I assist you today?
That's great to hear, Arun! Frankfurt is a vibrant city with a lot to offer. Are you looking for recommendations on things to do, places to eat, or anything specific while you're there?
Your name is Arun! How can I assist you further?
